name: outman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to have more people or better people than another group, team, army, etc.: Outmanned and outgunned, the three eventually surrendered to police. This is a team that has been outmanned almost every game this year.
More examplesFewer examplesWe were outgunned, outmanned and cut off from our extraction point.The protests deteriorated into clouds of tear gas unleashed by outmanned riot officers.The truth is the bad guys are outmanning the police department badly in the city.
